content.heading: <footer> Tag
paragraphs: The <footer> tag defines a footer for a document or section.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Contains authorship, copyright, contact, sitemap, or related links.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 5.0, Edge 9.0, Firefox 4.0, Safari 5.0, Opera 11.1.

content.heading: Examples
